name: Yonox Add Multiple Posts
author: Yonox

sections.description:
• Specify Post Type content to be added is a post or a page.
  • If Pages are added, admin can specify Parent Pages (to add children).
  • Can specify the Author of new posts/pages.
  • Can specify post status (Published / Draft / Pending Review).
  • Can now add content to posts/pages.
  • Can now choose a category from a drop-down to assign to new posts.
  • Support translation for Spanish and Romanian languages.

This plugin is designed to:

  • Quickly inserting multiple posts or pages at once to be edited later (with Post or Page Status option).
  • Perform a new site with the desired pages and sub-pages.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
  3. Go to the new admin menu created.
  4. That’s all folks. Enjoy.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Added Posts Content field with TinyMCE editor.

1.3

  • Added Post Type selector.
  • Added Status selector for Posts or Pages.
  • Added Category selector for Posts.
  • Added Parent selector for Pages.
  • Added translation support for Spanish and Romanian languages.

1.2

  • Version 1.2 Released.

short_description: Yonox Add Multiple Posts enables a WordPress admin to quickly add multiple posts or pages at once.
description:
• Specify Post Type content to be added is a post or a page.
  • If Pages are added, admin can specify Parent Pages (to add children).
  • Can specify the Author of new posts/pages.
  • Can specify post status (Published / Draft / Pending Review).
  • Can now add content to posts/pages.
  • Can now choose a category from a drop-down to assign to new posts.
  • Support translation for Spanish and Romanian languages.

This plugin is designed to:

  • Quickly inserting multiple posts or pages at once to be edited later (with Post or Page Status option).
  • Perform a new site with the desired pages and sub-pages.
